projects.name: The Neurons Bazaar
projects.description: This is the first full website I made using HTML and CSS. It was a fun process learning how to achieve certain features using the c=very basics of software design

projects.name: JS Calculator
projects.description: For this exercise, I had to create a fully functioning calculator using javascript. It was a great exercise for learning the very basics of JS functionality.

projects.name: BMI Calculator
projects.description: Similar to the JS calculator task, this task was for practising JS functionality and more specifically, custom functions. This task also helped me learn time management given that it was a timed task.

projects.name: Hex to RGB converter
projects.description: The above activity was to combine the basic JS functionality we practiced in previous tasks with more advanced array manipulations. Creating a function that performs the math of hex to RGB was fun.

projects.name: My first portfolio
projects.description: The first digital portfolio I made as an aspiring full-stack developer using HTML, CSS and bootstrap only. While my inexperience does show, I am very proud of how far I came in just 6 weeks.

projects.name: JS e-Commerce site
projects.description: The first fully functional e-commerce site I made. This was the end-of-module project we were given after JS and uses HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JS for aesthetics, functionality and responsivity.
